title: Xiong Bing Lian
synopsis: Sun Goddess of the Solari, Leona came to Earth in 2014. The genetics of God hidden on Earth has started to awaken. The first few awakenings include the Power of the Galaxy and God of War. An invasion by the alien Tao Tie, just to entertain Death God Karthus, are on the way to Earth.
related_anime: ['Chao Shen Xueyuan: Zhi Hei Jia', 'Lie Yang Tiandao I', 'Xiong Bing Lian: Zhi Zhu Tian Jianglin']
